ygData.subject: SV: [EverQuest] eq at work
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually the game runs on port 7000, and UDP not TCP... =) It uses a few other ports for logging in etc tho.. Like 1234, but no standard ports no... The patch
ygData.messageBody:
Actually the game runs on port 7000, and UDP not TCP... =)
It uses a few other ports for logging in etc tho.. Like 1234, but no
standard ports no... The patch server is a regular HTTP server running
on a different port aswell...

- Dunbar
(damn this list has gotten active lately;)
